{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

நொதித்தல் என்னும் சொல்லை உருவாக்கியவர் யார்?

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ராபர்ட் காக்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2151"},{"text":"

லூயிஸ் பாய்ச்சர்     

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:2152"},{"text":"

எட்வர்ட் ஜென்னர்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2162"},{"text":"

ஆன்டனி வான் லியூவன்ஹாக்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2167"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"ஸ்பைரோகைரா என்பது ________ஆகும்.
